item.title: Tea: A taste of harmony
item.author: Anum Farooq,
item.description: “I can drink tea until the cows come home and I love the atmosphere.” – Z. Budd “Tea is instant wisdom – just add water” – A. Alauda My most recent experiment involved a very ancient tradition. One that is the same in Chinese as in Persian, Urdu or Dari. The word is ‘chai’ Now, such research …
